body: Kids & Youth       There are many ways to enjoy a visit to St. Paul's Church and some of them are exclusive to kids! Just for starters, you can become a Junior Ranger or take a turn playing historic games during one of the many special weekends this national park hosts throughout the year. NEW! Check out our Park Fun page! We've just posted a famous ghost story about St. Paul's Church. And keep checking in with us, as over the next year we plan to post more "kid-only" activities from coloring pages to more stories.
title: Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site: Kids & Youth
